data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Vologda, Russia. Please, stir the 18,220 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vologda, Russia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Vologda, Russia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Vologda, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Vologda, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Yakut people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Vologda, Russia to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Vologda, Russia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Vologda, Russia has a population of 1,245,000.

We estimate Vologda has 18,220 people who might know Jesus, 698,796 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 527,984 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Vologda, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
